# Facilitator Notes Template

This template provides structure for session delivery notes, making sessions repeatable for meetups, workshops, and self-study.

**Session**: [Session Number and Title]  
**Duration**: 30 minutes  
**Type**: [Conceptual / Hands-on / Mixed]

---

## Pre-Session Checklist

- [ ] Review session content and modules
- [ ] Test all code examples (if applicable)
- [ ] Verify all links work
- [ ] Prepare demo environment (if needed)
- [ ] Review common questions/FAQs

---

## Timing Breakdown

| Segment | Duration | Activity |
|---------|----------|----------|
| **Objective** | 1-2 min | Set context, learning goals |
| **Core Concepts** | 10-12 min | Mental models, vocabulary, architecture |
| **Hands-on / Applied** | 12-15 min | Examples, reasoning, exercises |
| **Artifact + Recap** | 2-5 min | Deliverable creation, takeaways |

**Buffer Time**: 2-3 minutes for questions and transitions

---

## Delivery Notes

### Opening (1-2 minutes)

**Key Points to Cover**:
- [ ] Why this session matters
- [ ] How it builds on previous sessions
- [ ] What artifact learners will create

**Suggested Opening**:
> "Today we're exploring [topic]. By the end, you'll understand [key concept] and have created [artifact]."

### Core Concepts (10-12 minutes)

**Module 1: [Module Name]**
- **Key Points**: [List 2-3 critical points]
- **Common Confusion**: [What learners often misunderstand]
- **Architect Insight**: [System design takeaway]

**Module 2: [Module Name]**
- **Key Points**: [List 2-3 critical points]
- **Common Confusion**: [What learners often misunderstand]
- **Architect Insight**: [System design takeaway]

**Transition Phrases**:
- "Now that we understand [concept], let's see how it applies to [next concept]"
- "This leads us to an important architectural consideration..."

### Hands-on / Applied (12-15 minutes)

**Exercise/Demo**:
- [ ] [Exercise description]
- [ ] Expected outcome
- [ ] Common pitfalls to watch for

**Discussion Prompts**:
- "What trade-offs do you see here?"
- "How would this change in a production system?"
- "What failure modes should we consider?"

### Artifact Creation (2-5 minutes)

**Deliverable**: [Artifact type and description]

**Facilitation Tips**:
- [ ] Provide template or example
- [ ] Allow 2-3 minutes for creation
- [ ] Encourage sharing (if in group setting)

---

## Adaptations for Different Formats

### Self-Study
- Learners can take longer on each module
- Encourage note-taking during artifact creation
- Provide self-check questions

### Live Meetup
- Keep timing strict (30 minutes)
- Use breakout rooms for exercises (if virtual)
- Reserve 5-10 minutes for Q&A at end

### Workshop (Extended)
- Can expand to 45-60 minutes
- Add more hands-on exercises
- Include group discussions

---

- [ ] What worked well?
- [ ] What needs improvement?
- [ ] Questions that came up
- [ ] Timing adjustments needed
